mapper.insert: insert into quartz_config (id, `group`, `name`, cron, `status`, msg, quartz_class) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{group,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cron,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{msg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{quartzClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update quartz_config set `group` = #{group,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cron = #{cron,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `status` = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, msg = #{msg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, quartz_class = #{quartzClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, `group`, `name`, cron, `status`, msg, quartz_class from quartz_config
